text: I LOVE STRONG COFFEE AND ALMOST ALLWAYS USED "NEWMANS OWN" BUT I DECIDED TO TRY THESE BASED ON THE REVIEWS AND THE GREAT PRICE. WHAT A GREAT MOVE THIS TURNED OUT TO BE INCREDABLE COFFEE ,SMOOTH ,GREAT PRICE ,AND LESS PLASTIC. SO GOOD THAT I STARTED A SUBSCRIPTION,CHANGED TO INCREASE THE QUANTIY,AND NOW HAD TO ORDER A EXTRA SHIPMENT.
